skillTree.localised_description: A Bellowerâ€™s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield and encouraging unbridled carnage.
A small handful of Gnoblars surround this Ogre Lord, their swords always ready to cut and carve.
Stumpy and short-witted as they are, these Gnoblars have an eye on the sky at all times.
It never hurts to keep your lucky Gnoblar with you, just in case.
Step 1: Grease up your Gnoblars! Step 2: Go faster!
You have to watch 'em, as there's no telling what malicious schemes those wickedly cunning Gnoblars might enact.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: Puny magicks are nothing in the face of the Great Maw's endless hunger.
In the eyes of the brave, danger gleams like sunshine.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Tabby has guarded and protected Katerina ever since the Sabretooth has been large enough and old enough to do so.
Even before she grew up under the watchful eye of an Ogre Tyrant, Katerina had a remarkable capacity for violence entirely unbecoming a Bretonnian maiden.
The Gnoblars of Katerina's tribe respect her capacity for violence, and her ability to lead them to treasure. And they love a good ambush.

enabled_if: Not on or below a platform

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only

skillTree.localised_description: The gnoblars of her tribe look up to her in all respects, even if they don't quite understand some of her more Bretonnian notions.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -50% for Gnoblars units
	(all units in army)

Recruit rank: +3 for Gnoblars units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: A master of exploiting others' weaknesses, Katerina and her Gnoblars are never where you expect them and always where they can get the most loot.
No matter where the gold is hidden, Tabby and Katerina can find it.
There's nothing more that Gnoblars like than a fight that's already being won.

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Gnoblar Trappers
Spawned unit fights in this battle only

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Katerina de Hansebourg is the daughter of a Bretonnian merchant, became the chieftain of Gnoblars in an Ogre tribe, and a fierce combatant and raider. She's also accompanied by a pet Sabretooth.

effects.description:
Income from raiding: +30%
	(all units in army)

Leadership: +8 for Gnoblars units
	(all units in army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
